1.title: Belle's First Class
1.plot: On the first episode the audience gets introduced to Belle, her dance teacher, and ballerinas from the new dance school. Belle's dream is to become a ballerina. At night she dreams of being the lead dancer from the ballet Swan Lake.

2.title: Daydreaming
2.plot: Belle is now confronted with her daydreaming habits and Nicole a little girl from school reveals her mocking behavior towards her. Belle will find friendship with sweet Pauline.

3.title: Looking Up to Gisele
3.plot: Belle is now settled in her new life in France.. She and her friends are dancing on the music of the ballet "Gisele" which inspires her to dream about a dancer she admires. The music box comes alive.

4.title: The Pyjama Party
4.plot: It's pyjama party time! Belle and her friends are having fun learning about stage makeup. At night, Belle dreams she is dancing with Nicole her enemy. Is Belle starting to like Nicole?

5.title: The Sacred Shoes
5.plot: Belle and her dance friends are not yet ready to dance on toe shoes but Nicole can and teases her. The dramatic music of the Firebird will empower Belle's dazzling performance when she dreams of dancing with the desired shoes.

6.title: Missing Daddy
6.plot: Belle is missing her daddy tremendously. He sent her a doll from India and she dreams of being the beautiful Bayadère, the Indian dancer from the ballet she learned. Manon interferes to reason Nicole who continues to be mean.

7.title: Belle Confronts Her Fears
7.plot: At dance school Nicole is trying to scare the little ones by saying scary things about a mysterious nearby forest. Belle confronts her fear by venturing into the woods and sees four of her friends dancing as Ghosts. Is she dreaming?

8.title: Belle's Wish Comes True
8.plot: Belle and her dance friends attend a "Don Quixote" rehearsal with special guests. When daring Nicole asks Rodolphe to dance with her Belle is furious but her wish to dance the Don Quixote duet will come true! The magic works.

9.title: Camaraderie
9.plot: Belle continues her journey in France where she feels integrated at school and dance. Except Nicole who continues to bully her, Belle is happy having many friends like Pauline, Charlotte, Kate but also Pierre who is very dear to her heart.

10.title: Starting a Friendship?
10.plot: Belle loves the story of Cinderella and dreams to be her. Nicole and her friend Sophie want to be included in Belle's group. Could that be the start of a new friendship between Belle and bully Nicole?

11.title: A Wonderful Dream
11.plot: Monsieur Vilert, a puppeteer, arrives at the dance school to present a puppet show with Petrushka. In Belle's dream she will pay a visit to Monsieur Vilert's workshop and with have a breathtaking experience.

12.title: United We Stand
12.plot: Belle and her friends are learning a dance with rubans from the ballet "La Fille mal gardée". Beside having fun, they share their frustrations for not getting special roles in the upcoming "Nutcracker" performance.

13.title: Will Daddy Be Home for Christmas?
13.plot: It's Christmas time! The Nutcracker recital is coming soon. Who broke Belle's Christmas ornaments she took to dance school to show to her friends? Belle's forgiveness will be well rewarded.

imdb.title: Ballerina Belle
plot: Enter the world of Belle who dreams of becoming a Ballerina. Throughout her adventures the audience will be introduced to ballet steps and classical music from the most famous ballets of all time.::Carol Talmon de l'Armée
